Public Methods

int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, moves the particle for the time elapsed since the last frame.

 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object.

 the particle color.

 the texture applied over the face that represents the particle.

Detailed Description

Coloured particle class.

This class implements a particle that has colour and transparency.
